abstract: One ex-pat's view of the new film from the place where the book began.
snippet: One ex-pat's view of the new film from the place where the book began.
lead_paragraph: We've talked about the Americanization of the film "I Don't Know How She Does It," recently. But how does that shift look from the other side of the Atlantic, where the book was originally set?

headline.main: How She Does It in Britain
